Room.Name: Allisk Labyrinth
Room.ShortDescription: You are somewhere inside the Allisk Labyrinth, no doubt quite lost.
Room.LongDescription: You are apperently lost inside the Allisk Labyrinth. The stone-grey walls appear identical in every direction you look. Although you feel like you haven't been in this direction before, you also feel that somehow you're going around in circles. The Labyrinth was built many centuries ago and rumor has it that minotars and flying snakes still roam the corridors looking for food.
